name: RetrieveLoyaltyPromotion
description:
Retrieve details of a specific loyalty promotion.

Use this tool to get information about a specific loyalty promotion identified by program and promotion IDs. Call this tool when you need to access or display details of a particular loyalty promotion.

parameters.name: loyalty_promotion_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the loyalty promotion to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [loyalty promotion](entity:LoyaltyPromotion) to retrieve.

parameters.name: loyalty_program_id
parameters.description: The ID of the base loyalty program. Retrieve it by calling RetrieveLoyaltyProgram with the 'main' keyword.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the base [loyalty program](entity:LoyaltyProgram). To get the program ID,
call [RetrieveLoyaltyProgram](api-endpoint:Loyalty-RetrieveLoyaltyProgram) using the `main` keyword.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: promotion_id
parameters.description: The ID of the [loyalty promotion](entity:LoyaltyPromotion) to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [loyalty promotion](entity:LoyaltyPromotion) to retrieve.

parameters.name: program_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the base [loyalty program](entity:LoyaltyProgram). To get the program ID,
call [RetrieveLoyaltyProgram](api-endpoint:Loyalty-RetrieveLoyaltyProgram) using the `main` keyword.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the base [loyalty program](entity:LoyaltyProgram). To get the program ID,
call [RetrieveLoyaltyProgram](api-endpoint:Loyalty-RetrieveLoyaltyProgram) using the `main` keyword.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
